content.raw: So we have been having some issues with the allowed limits for the damping users can set, @catkeson mentioned this issue on pull request #248 but it didn't seem to be answered. We are also having problems with the ankle joint damping when using our controllers, we see a lot of vibration. We would appreciate an increase on the allowed upper limits.
content.html: So we have been having some issues with the allowed limits for the damping users can set, @catkeson mentioned this issue on pull request #248 but it didn't seem to be answered. We are also having problems with the ankle joint damping when using our controllers, we see a lot of vibration. We would appreciate an increase on the allowed upper limits.
